Description.p: Assigned OID: as per Snomed CT, qv the link below.
Any code from the SnomedCT UK subset that describes a person's awareness of a care issue, for example of a diagnosis
A code taken from SNOMED CT.
The code shall describe a person's awareness of a care issue.
A code from Snomed-CT (UK) may be accompanied by additional qualifying codes from the same coding system.
